dl.dd: A code from Snomed-CT (UK) may be a very general code, with device type in originalText, or may be accompanied by additional qualifying codes from the same coding system.
The codes available in the Read Codes are currently limited. However, where necessary the originalText element may be used to specify a more detailed type of device.
